news_header: Two US lawmakers have condemned the UK's request to access encrypted data from Apple users, calling it a dangerous threat to US privacy and security. They urge the US national intelligence director to issue an ultimatum to the UK.
news_original_title: US politicians furious at UK demand for encrypted Apple data
news_text: The request involves Apple's Advanced Data Protection, which uses end-to-end encryption. Experts and privacy advocates have criticized the UK's move as an unprecedented attack on individual privacy. Apple has stated it would not comply with such demands and would withdraw its encryption services from the UK if necessary.
